question: Actually my Grandfather passed away recently, my mom often sees him in her dreams
answer:
QUESTION
Asalam u alaoikum ! Actually my Grandfather passed away recently, my mom often sees him in her dreams , she was just curious to know if it was good or bad for her .she sees different dreams every time like once she saw tht he was going to get married and every one was getting ready to attend his wedding but my mom refused to go . wat does this mean ? Secondly , I wanted to know , if the souls (ROOH) , knows who was sincere to her/him in the world? Plz tell me as soon as possible ? Jazakallah khaira !
ANSWER


Share:
1. Generally, dreams of the deceased are good. They serve as reminders of death and to make preparations for that.

2. The soul knows who are sincere to him or her.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
